Text: I downloaded one song and it has a website ad in it twice.  Didn't d/l the rest and scrapped the torrent.

Moved to Audio > Other

Music torrents belong in the Audio category.
They should be uploaded to Audio > Music, unless they contain .TXT or .URL files.
hey you uppity little faggot: stop contaminating music with some dumbass adverts. I will hunt you down and slap your tits in your favorite push up bra in front of your parents!!!!!
